department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Want to purchase Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for various departments of Canadian Government.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: TBIPS Multiple Categories for GCSurplus

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01030787
*   **Solicitation Number:** 20232076
*   **Publication Date:** March 24, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Daniel Michaud
    *   Email: <daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *   Phone: 613-858-8483

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) supply arrangement to provide informatics professional services to Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). The services include:

*   Level 3 - A.1 Application/Software Architect
*   Level 3 - A.7 Programmer/Analyst
*   Level 3 - A.8 System Analyst
*   Level 3 - A.11 Tester

The contract duration is for a period of one (1) year plus two (2) one-year irrevocable options.

### Accessibility and Security Requirements

The Government of Canada aims to ensure that the goods and services it purchases are accessible by default. As such, bidders must adhere to the Treasury Board Contracting Policy, which requires accessibility criteria to be included in the requirements for goods and services where necessary.

### Security Requirements

Security requirements associated with this requirement are mentioned in Part 6 – Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 – Resulting Contract Clauses. For more information, please refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada (http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/introduction-eng.html).

### How to Submit Questions

All questions in relation to this solicitation must be sent via email to Daniel Michaud at <daniel.michaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>. Do not submit any questions by phone or in person. This is to ensure consistency and record-keeping.

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible to bid, you must be a holder of a TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) with the required resource categories in this solicitation and the National Capital Region (NCR).
